name: Tower Walls
description:
Welcome to Tower Walls!

Wall jump and glitch your way to the top of the tower to save the helpless princess stuck at the top.

This was a submission to the WOWIE! Game Jam 2.0 with the theme of Intentional Bugs. Tower Walls was built by a small team of 4 people in the span of 3 days.

Credits

Art, Level, & Concept Design - Senpai

Programming - Another one & Dread Devil

Sound Effects - Innocent on Laptop
